name: The Department of Fresh Starts
description:
Step into your role at the Department of Death Department of Fresh Starts and assist with the eternally boring eternally vital work of helping souls transition into their next phase of existence. Do not consider your own existence, you exist to serve.

A game made by speck (itch.io)

With help from b <3.



Content Warning: The current demo build does not come with any content warnings.

The story planned for the full game does touch on some more serious topics, so please check for an updated content warning when future updates are posted.

This game is a demo and the story is incomplete. Made for Buddy Up Jam 2021.
